pageContext.claim: “Great news out of Turkey. News Conference shortly with @VP and @SecPompeo. Thank you to @RTErdogan. Millions of lives will be saved!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is spinning bad news as good news. The Turkish invasion he permitted (which endangered the Kurds in the first place) by removing U.S. troops as a buffer allowed Turkish and Russian forces to sweep into areas held by the Kurds.
